properties.title: Bikepark Bonaduz
properties.abstract: The Bike Park Bonaduz is a perfect training terrain for people of all ages who want to work on their technical skills. There are sections which promote balance, single trails with roots as well as north shore elements and banked turns.
properties.description:
The bike park is located along the way from Bonaduz to Versam. Take the first left immediately after the first railway crossing and continue along Sculmserstrasse. From the old crazy golf course it's roughly another 300m. The entrance to the Bike Park Bonaduz is right on the edge of the forest on the right.

The bike park is financed and maintained by Bieler Sport Bonaduz. Weather conditions occasionally damage elements! Please inspect the trail and elements before use! Use of the bike park is at your own risk.
properties.name: Chur Tourismus
